full_text:
COLLECTION AND ENFORCEMENT.

	(a)	The Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge for each parcel shall be collected by and be payable to the Los Angeles County Tax Collector along with the general taxes levied for City and County purposes and shall be subject to the same penalties and enforcement provisions relating to general taxes.  (Amended by Ord. No. 168,980, Eff. 9/12/93.)

	(b)	If any portion of the levy, collection or expenditure of the Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge provided for herein is declared invalid or unconstitutional, the remaining levy, collection or expenditure of the Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge shall not be affected but remain in full force and effect.

2.catch_line: Land Use Categories And Run-Off Factors.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

COLLECTION AND ENFORCEMENT. (§ 64.51.07)

  COLLECTION AND ENFORCEMENT.	(a)	The Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge for
each parcel shall be collected by and be payable to the Los Angeles County Tax
Collector along with the general taxes levied for City and County purposes and
shall be subject to the same penalties and enforcement provisions relating to
general taxes.  (Amended by Ord. No. 168,980, Eff. 9/12/93.)	(b)	If any portion
of the levy, collection or expenditure of the Stormwater Pollution Abatement
Charge provided for herein is declared invalid or unconstitutional, the
remaining levy, collection or expenditure of the Stormwater Pollution Abatement
Charge shall not be affected but remain in full force and effect.

COLLECTION AND ENFORCEMENT.

(a) The Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge for each parcel shall be collected by and be payable to the Los Angeles County Tax Collector along with the general taxes levied for City and County purposes and shall be subject to the same penalties and enforcement provisions relating to general taxes.  (Amended by Ord. No. 168,980, Eff. 9/12/93.)

(b) If any portion of the levy, collection or expenditure of the Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge provided for herein is declared invalid or unconstitutional, the remaining levy, collection or expenditure of the Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge shall not be affected but remain in full force and effect.
